SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ISNULL((SELECT PJT_NM FROM T_SM3000 WHERE T_SM3000.PJT_CD = A.PJT_CD),' ') PJT_NM, A.OUT_CORP, A.OUT_ITEM, A.CONTRACT_NM, A.DEPT_CD, A.CONTRACT_DATE, A.CONTRACT_AMT, B.CUST_NM, D.LEVEL2_NM E_RMK_NM, E.DEPT_NM, F.LEVEL2_NM OUT_ITEM_NM, A.PJT_CD, (CASE ISNULL(G.PJT_E_GBN,'') WHEN '' THEN '진행' WHEN ' ' THEN '진행' WHEN '1' THEN '준공' WHEN '2' THEN '중도타절' END) PJT_E_GBN_NM, (CASE WHEN ISNULL(G.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT,0) != 0 AND ISNULL(G.PJT_CONTRACT_AMT,0) != 0 THEN (ISNULL(G.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT,0)/ISNULL(G.PJT_CONTRACT_AMT,0))*100 ELSE 0 END) PJT_CONTRACT_PER, G.G_YAREA_P, G.G_YAREA_M, G.BUILD_TYPE, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '170' AND LEVEL2_CD = G.BUILD_TYPE) BUILD_TYPE_NM FROM T_P12000 A, T_AC0300 B, (SELECT * FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '130') D, T_SC1010 E, (SELECT * FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '160') F, T_P11000 G WHERE A.OUT_CORP *= B.CUST_CD AND A.E_RMK *= D.LEVEL2_CD AND A.DEPT_CD *= E.DEPT_CD AND A.OUT_ITEM *= F.LEVEL2_CD AND A.PJT_CD *= G.PJT_CD ) A, (SELECT * FROM SF_SC1010('03', '', #{inDeptCd},'')) D WHERE A.DEPT_CD = D.DEPT_CD AND A.CONTRACT_DATE LIKE #{inContractDate} + '%' AND A.PJT_CD LIKE '%' + #{inPjtCd} +'%'
AND A.OUT_ITEM LIKE '%' + #{inOutItem} + '%' AND A.CUST_NM LIKE '%' + #{inCustNm} + '%' AND A.CONTRACT_NM LIKE '%' + #{inContractNm} + '%' AND A.BUILD_TYPE LIKE '%' + #{inBuildType} + '%' ORDER BY A.DEPT_CD, A.PJT_CD, A.OUT_ITEM, A.OUT_CORP

SELECT C.LEVEL2_NM as OUT_ITEM_NM ,A.OUT_ITEM ,B.CUST_NM as CUST_NM ,A.contract_amt as CONTRACT_AMT ,PJT_CD as PJT_CD ,A.OUT_CORP as OUT_CORP FROM T_P12000 A ,T_AC0300 B ,(SELECT * FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '160')C WHERE A.out_corp *= B.CUST_CD AND A.OUT_ITEM *= C.LEVEL2_CD AND A.pjt_cd LIKE '%'+#{PJT_CD}+'%' ORDER BY OUT_ITEM

SELECT B.LEVEL2_NM as SCV_NM ,A.EX_AMT as EX_AMT ,ISNULL(A.EX_WORK_AMT,0) as EX_WORK_AMT FROM T_P11070 A ,(SELECT * FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '160')B WHERE A.SCV_PART *= B.LEVEL2_CD AND A.PJT_CD LIKE '%'+#{PJT_CD}+'%' ORDER BY SCV_PART

SELECT A.PJT_CD as PJT_CD ,B.PJT_NM as PJT_NM ,D.DEPT_CD as DEPT_CD ,D.DEPT_NM as DEPT_NM ,C.KOR_NM as PM_NM FROM T_P11000_H A ,T_SM3000 B ,T_HM1000 C ,T_SC1010 D WHERE A.PJT_CD *= B.PJT_CD AND A.PM_EMP_NO *= C.EMP_NO AND A.DEPT_CD *= D.DEPT_CD AND A.PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND PJT_SEQ = (SELECT max(PJT_SEQ)from T_P11000_H WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD})

SELECT OUT_ITEM ,A.OUT_CORP AS OUT_CORP ,B.CUST_NM AS OUT_CORP_NM ,CONTRACT_NM ,CONVERT (DATE, A.CONTRACT_DATE) AS CONTRACT_DATE ,CONVERT (DATE, A.S_DATE) AS S_DATE ,CONVERT (DATE, A.E_DATE) AS E_DATE ,E_RMK ,CON_DOC_YN ,CONTRACT_AMT ,VAT_YN ,D.VAT_YN_NM ,C.E_RMK_NM ,E.OUT_ITEM_NM FROM T_P12000 A ,(SELECT CUST_CD,CUST_NM FROM T_AC0300) B ,(SELECT LEVEL2_CD,LEVEL2_NM as E_RMK_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE busi_gb = 'j' and level1_cd = '130') C ,(SELECT LEVEL2_CD,LEVEL2_NM as VAT_YN_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE busi_gb = 'j' and level1_cd = '340') D ,(SELECT LEVEL2_CD,LEVEL2_NM as OUT_ITEM_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '160') E WHERE A.OUT_ITEM *= E.LEVEL2_CD AND A.OUT_CORP *= B.CUST_CD AND A.E_RMK *= C.LEVEL2_CD AND A.VAT_YN *= D.LEVEL2_CD AND PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND OUT_CORP = #{OUT_CORP} AND OUT_ITEM = #{OUT_ITEM}

SELECT * FROM T_P12010 A ,(SELECT LEVEL2_CD,LEVEL2_NM AS GI_GBN_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE busi_gb = 'j' and level1_cd = '150') B WHERE A.GI_GBN *= B.LEVEL2_CD AND PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND OUT_CORP = #{OUT_CORP} AND OUT_ITEM = #{OUT_ITEM}

SELECT * FROM T_P12020 A ,(SELECT LEVEL2_CD,LEVEL2_NM AS CONTRACT_MEMO_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE busi_gb = 'j' and level1_cd = '410') B WHERE A.CONTRACT_MEMO *= B.LEVEL2_CD AND PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND OUT_CORP = #{OUT_CORP} AND OUT_ITEM = #{OUT_ITEM}

SELECT X.BUILD_NM,X.PJT_NM, ISNULL(X.BIZ_NM,'') BIZ_NM, X.CUST_NM, X.G_AREA_P, X.G_YAREA_P, X.CONTRACT_AMT, X.CONTRACT_DAN, X.CONTRACT_RAT, X.OUT_01, X.DAN_01, -- 건축 01 X.OUT_02, X.DAN_02, -- 기계 02 X.OUT_03, X.DAN_03, -- 전기 03 X.OUT_04, X.DAN_04, -- 구조 04 X.OUT_05, X.DAN_05, -- 견적 05 X.OUT_08, X.DAN_08, -- 교통영향평가 08 X.OUT_11, X.DAN_11, -- 측량 11 X.OUT_14, X.DAN_14, -- 소방 14 X.OUT_29, X.DAN_29, -- 기타 29 X.OUT_04, X.DAN_04, -- 토목 04 X.OUT_05, X.DAN_05, -- 조경 05 X.OUT_10, X.DAN_10, -- 지질조사 10 X.OUT_12, X.DAN_12, -- 흙막이 12 X.COST2_01, X.COST2_02, --제조경비1 중 조감도비 , 모형비 ISNULL(X.WORK_STEP_NM,'') WORK_STEP_NM, X.COST_AMT1, X.SIL_COST1, X.CHA_COST1, X.PLAN_MH1, X.PLAN_MH2, X.PLAN_TOT, X.SIL_MH1, X.SIL_MH2, X.SIL_TOT, PJT_CD,BUILD_GBN FROM SF_P01_2400M_SL1(#{STRAT_DATE}, #{END_DATE}, #{BUILD_CD}, #{BIZ_CD}, #{Y_P_STRAT}, #{Y_P_END}, #{DG_P_STRAT}, #{DG_P_END}) X
ORDER BY X.BUILD_GBN, X.YAREA_GBN, X.BIZ_GBN, X.GUBUN, X.GUBUN_SEQ, X.G_YAREA_P, X.PJT_CD
